title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Lake Garda, Italy
content:
Photo submitted by Eddy Fokken, “…on holiday in Italy. Lake Garda where the sun plays with the chameleon paint on my Specialized (I taped the I and Z) so i have an ‘special ed'” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Lake Garda, Italy appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
